appsgate.lig.router.impl
Class RouterImpl

java.lang.Object
  appsgate.lig.router.impl.RouterImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
RouterApAMSpec
public class RouterImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements RouterApAMSpec

This class is use to address with generic means all the devices and services recruited through ApAM middleware.

Since:
February 14, 2013
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Cédric Gérard
